title: Keep Your Heart Free From Offense | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Keep Your Heart Free From Offense | Victoria Osteen
description:
If we’re going to live in victory, we have to learn to keep our hearts free from offense. When you choose to let the offense go, God will help you live healthy and whole. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
